sentences.en: A group of senators plans to filibuster a measure that would permit drilling in Alaska.
sentences.cn: 参议员们试图阻挠一项允许在阿拉斯加州钻探石油的议案获得通过。

sentences.en: Opponents of the bill tried to filibuster its final stages.
sentences.cn: 反对者发表长篇大论，试图阻挠议案的最终通过。

sentences.en: Senator Seymour has threatened a filibuster to block the bill.
sentences.cn: 参议员西摩威胁说要发表长篇演说来阻挠议案通过。

sentences.en: They simply threatened to filibuster until the Senate adjourns.
sentences.cn: 他们仅威胁说要发动抗争直到参议院休会.

sentences.en: We could not prolong a filibuster indefinitely.
sentences.cn: 我们不能无限期地延长抗争.

words.tran_cn: （美）阻挠议事的议员；暴民；海盗
海盗；暴兵，掠夺兵；阻挠议事的议员；阻挠议事的行动

trans.tran_cn: [史]掠夺兵，暴兵，海盗，阻挠议事的议员，会议妨碍行为
